fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- ~~Troll Box (Day): Make it look like a player says something. They will not see the message.~~
> - ~~Code of conduct applies!~~
- Distract (Day, 2 Uses): Silence target player for ~~20 seconds~~ 4 hours. They will not be able to speak or use abilities for the duration.
- Incriminate (Night): Make a target appear framed tonight. They will remain as marked until you mark someone else.
- Disguise (Night, 2 Uses): Player will appear as chosen class, if executed tomorrow. They will remain as marked until you mark someone else.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Resolve: Become death immune for 1 night if attacked, then lose this passive. Lose this passive when you achieve your objective.

fields.name: Note:
fields.value: Troll Box is removed. Silence lasts for four hours. In the goal, "executed" should be "lynched."
